title: Interpretation of rape in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of rape in a dream is the subject of our article today, and it is one of the most disturbing and repulsive visions that a person can see during his sleep. Animals do not do this despite the mind God has given to humans. Which did not have an animal. Given the dreamer’s anxiety about this dream, we present through the encyclopedia of its various interpretations and connotations, so follow us. Interpretation of rape in a dreamInterpretation of rape in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Rape in a dream shows the weakness of his faith. Seeing the dreamer raping someone is evidence that he committed Sins and false deeds. Seeing the dreamer raping a girl during sleep indicates his evil intention and his distance from God Almighty. Seeing a girl in a dream being raped by someone shows what she feels of frozen desires. The girl’s rejection in a dream symbolizes someone trying to rape her, which means that she will suffer from Great harm. Rape in an unmarried woman’s dream may indicate her distance from God and her committing sins. Seeing a married woman being raped by a stranger indicates that she will go through marital problems and quarrels. Interpretation of harassment in a dream for a single woman: One dream has many different meanings, which we mention as follows: Rape in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates troubles, problems, pressures, and accusations that she will go through in her life. If the harasser is a relative of the viewer, she should beware of him because he hides something sick and evil in himself for her. Harassment in an unmarried woman’s dream may indicate illicit love in her life. Harassment of a relative symbolizes a serious illness, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about rape for a married woman: When a married woman sees her husband raping her in a dream, this indicates the intensity of his love for her and his desire to remain close to her permanently. The meaning of this dream may be the woman’s distress toward her husband and his actions, And his hatred for much of his nature. Interpretation of a dream about rape for a pregnant woman: A husband raping his wife in a dream indicates the extent of his love for her. If a wife sees that her husband is raping her in a dream, this means that the date of childbirth is approaching and that it will be an easy birth. Interpretation of a dream about child molestation may indicate that child molestation in a dream To the forbidden money earned by the head of the family and serve as a warning message about the need for him to repent and return to the path of truth. Interpretation of dreams of a strange man harassing me. Seeing an unknown man rushing the dreamer indicates problems and difficulties that she will face in her life, so she must be careful and stay away from suspicion. Rape in general indicates In a dream to the problems that the dreamer is experiencing, and to interpret another dream, you can enter into the direct application of dream interpretation.

title: Interpretation of seeing incense in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about incense Incense in a dream has many interpretations. It is used to perfume the house, and it is also used to expel demons and eliminate envy of the people of the house. Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing incense in a dream has many connotations. Whoever sees incense in a dream and smells its scent in a dream, this indicates the good news that the dreamer will receive. And whoever sees in a dream that he is burning himself with incense, this is a sign of his good behavior among people. The interpreters interpreted Seeing incense in a dream is a sign of the end of a dispute between the dreamer and one of his relatives or friends. Whoever sees in a dream that he is holding incense in his hand, this indicates the fulfillment of his desires and ambitions. And whoever sees incense in a dream sprouting other incense, this indicates that God will bless him with a son. In most cases, it is Sak, and he is a good man with a great relationship. Whoever dreams that he burns incense for a people or at their insistence, this means that he will achieve his goals and victory and win something that he was trying to achieve and it can indicate the end of fear and anxiety on the one hand. For the patient who sees incense in In a dream, this indicates an imminent recovery. Interpretation of seeing incense in a dream: There is an interpretation for someone who sees in a dream that it is evaporating or evaporating, as it indicates that the sorcerer is broken for the dreamer: Black incense in a dream indicates the end of distress, worry, and worry. Seeing incense in a dream is a sign of Good because it indicates an abundance of food, a blessing in money, excellence in work and success. Whoever sees in a dream that he is incense burning the house, this indicates marriage to a just wife. Seeing incense in a dream may indicate that something is missing, or if he is disabled, this indicates On his righteousness and abandoning his sins. The evil of seeing incense in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is lighting incense, is the one who reveals secrets, either by himself or through those who told him. The smell of incense in a dream indicates bribery. Seeing incense can mean death for the sick person. There are those who interpret the vision Incense is a sign of closeness and the use of hypocritical methods to achieve interests. Interpretation of seeing incense for a pregnant woman: Seeing incense for a pregnant woman indicates the ease of her pregnancy, the end of her pregnancy period, receiving good news and the end of troubles. Whoever sees in a dream that it is scented with incense, has a pleasant scent, and is spread throughout the house This indicates that God will give her a good son with high morals, who will occupy a high position educationally and professionally. Interpretation of seeing incense for a married woman. Whoever dreams of lighting incense or incense for him, this indicates the abundance of livelihood and blessing that prevails in her, and the end of marital problems. Therefore, we have presented to you all Possible interpretations of seeing incense in a dream. Whoever has a vision and wants to interpret it, we receive your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing Satan in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the devil in a dream is one of the visions that the dreamer fears greatly and tries to search for an interpretation of this dream to reassure himself, so we will try to locate some interpretations of previous visions by the most important dream interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, but these interpretations we will want to. The appearance of the work cannot be deduced when there is a similar vision because there are many circumstances that affect the interpretation of visions, the most important of which are the person's circumstances, in addition to the fact that there are many details that the interpreter needs to know before interpreting visions. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing pins in a dream Interpretation of seeing the devil in a dream The dream of the devil is one of the dreams that indicate that there are some enemies hiding in the dreamer, and this vision may indicate the cunning and deception that the dreamer is exposed to in reality. The owner of influence and prestige. Interpretation of seeing the devil in a dream Seeing the cursed devil in a dream Interpretation of seeing the devil in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions, as the dream of escaping from the cursed devil by reading the Qur’an indicates the presence of a cunning opponent in reality for the dreamer. This dream can also be a sign that a woman is trying to seduce the dreamer or that there are bad things that the woman is trying to make the dreamer do. Also, dreaming of the devil reading the Qur’an until he gets rid of him indicates a close relief from worries and getting rid of the sins and sins committed by the dreamer, and it is one of the good visions in this case. You may also be interested in: Piano in a dream Seeing the devil’s joy and sadness in a dream When you dream of a person who fears the devil in a dream, this indicates safety from the deception and deception of others and their sincerity in worship and religion. As for seeing Satan happy, this indicates that the dreamer is preoccupied with worldly desires and religious desires and far from God, but when he sees sadness and crying in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is one of the righteous who are. full. With kindness. You may also be interested in: The project in a dream Seeing the devil naked or changing clothes in a dream When the dreamer sees in a dream that the devil is taking off his clothes or tearing them, this indicates turmoil and that there are unpleasant things that may happen, and God knows best. Seeing the devil in a dream in the form of a man When the dreamer sees that the devil is following him, this may be an indication of the presence of a cunning enemy trying to deceive the dreamer and trying to cause calamities, disasters and evil deeds. But if the vision is that the devil is under the leadership and authority of the dreamer, this is an indication of the strength and pride that the dreamer will be able to gain. A sign of near victory, God willing. You may also be interested in: Symbols that indicate problems Dreaming of the devil chasing me If we dream that the dreamer kills the leader of the demons, or that he kills a great ghost, or that he kills the devil, this is evidence that the dreamer is one of the fraudsters who work to deceive others, and whoever dreams that he is the king of the demons, this indicates that he will be able to gain prestige, power and strength, but this dream is one of the undesirable dreams that the dreamer must

title: Interpretation of a dream about a trumpet in a dream for a man and a woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a trumpet by Ibn Sirini: A trumpet in a dream indicates the good reputation that the dreamer has. Seeing a trumpet in a dream, while hearing its sound, indicates the hope that awaits the dreamer. Seeing a trumpet is evidence of some problems that will befall him. A trumpet in a dream can indicate Fake and false news. Seeing a broken horn is a sign of death or an accident. Interpretation of a dream about a trumpet for a man. If a man sees in a dream that someone is calling him with a trumpet, this indicates a quarrel that will occur between the dreamer and a friend. Seeing a man in a dream carrying a trumpet in a dream means a lie that he will tell This man. Look at the man inside the dream that he is blowing a trumpet, this indicates the emergence of some problems and misfortunes in the dreamer’s life. The sound of a trumpet in a dream is evidence of a person’s fear of his enemies. Hearing a trumpet and singing well shows great gains. Seeing bad singing and hearing a trumpet is a sign of news. Bad. Seeing a trumpet blowing that was easy to control indicates the success that the dreamer will achieve. Interpretation of a dream about a Nabulsi trumpet. A trumpet in a dream is a sign of a person who has a good reputation and good character. A trumpet in a dream indicates a beautiful woman with good morals. A trumpet blowing during a dream is evidence for a leading man. The trumpet indicates hearing a false word, because it indicates false testimony. Hearing the trumpet could be a sign of problems at work. Interpretation of a trumpet dream for a single woman: If a girl sees in a dream that she is blowing a trumpet, this indicates her desire to get married. Seeing the trumpet being blown in A trumpet in a girl’s dream is an indication of a benefit that she will receive. Seeing yourself listening to bad songs with the sound of a trumpet indicates losses. Hearing the cheerful tone of a trumpet means that we hear happy news. A trumpet heard in a dream may indicate some strangers’ interest in the girl. Interpretation of a trumpet dream For a married woman: The sound of a trumpet in a married woman’s dream indicates happy news. If you see some people blowing trumpets in a dream, this indicates disputes and competition. If you see women blowing a trumpet, this is evidence of the fulfillment of desires and goals. To hear a trumpet loudly means happy and urgent news. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about an unknown groom

preview.html: Seeing that the unknown groom rejected the bride in a dream indicates the emergence of many problems and fears for the dreamer, and through the following lines of our Mufsir.com website, we will talk about the dream in detail. Follow us.Interpretation of seeing an unknown groom in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she married an unknown groom. When he was awake, he was dead and very close to her in life. The meaning here indicates that this dreaming single girl will face things full of evil and unhappiness in Her life will be greatly regretted. The dreaming unmarried woman dreams that she sees a groom proposing to her whom she has never known before in her life, and she rejoices in his presence. This means that this single woman is waiting for the groom to come to propose to her. She is very disappointed because he is delaying the wedding at this time. And seeing An unmarried girl appears in a dream, looking at the groom who is marrying her. This was the first time she saw him in a dream and she did not feel comfortable seeing him. Here, it appears that this single woman will approach her wedding date if she gets engaged while she is awake. If she is not engaged, It will be soon. See also: Interpretation of a dream about marrying someone you love. Interpretation of seeing an unknown groom in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that she has married an unknown groom and her husband was happy and content with this marriage in the dream. It appears that this married woman will find some things in her life. It will cause her a lot of mental confusion during this period. The married woman is a dreamer who sees in a dream that she is searching for an unknown groom and wants to divorce and stay away from her husband in the dream. This means that this married woman will face some psychological crises during this period, which will affect her greatly, I swear to God. I know. The married woman who sees in a dream that she was accepting the marriage of the unknown dead groom in the dream, and he was very close to her. The interpretation states that this married woman will live long periods of distress and sadness in her life, and God knows best. And seeing the married woman rejecting the presence of the unknown groom in the dream And she leaves him and stays away from him in the dream. It seems that he gets rid of the problems that this married woman was going through in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing the unknown groom in a dream for the divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees in a dream that the unknown groom wanted to marry her and approached her in the dream, but he strongly rejected him. The meaning indicates that this divorced woman will get rid of some of the major problems that will happen to her at this time in her life. What if the divorced woman sees in a dream that there is an unknown groom. He did not know her before and he tried to propose to her through her ex-husband in the dream. It indicates The great jealousy that her ex-husband felt during this period. He is trying to bring her back to her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. A divorced woman who dreams of accepting marriage to an unknown groom who died in life, and whom she knew well before in waking life. It explains that there are many problems that she will face. This divorced woman will be upset and upset

title: Interpretation of seeing vitiligo or leprosy in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a leper in a dream: Whoever sees leprosy spread throughout all parts of his body in a dream, this indicates that he is dressed without adornment. Scientists have interpreted seeing vitiligo spread throughout the body, because it indicates the acquisition of money. Whoever sees leprosy spreading in a dream on his legs, hands and feet This indicates praiseworthy things that will happen to the dreamer in the coming period. And see the spread of vitiligo on the face and head in the dream. This indicates the problems and fears that the dreamer suffers from and the many sorrows that he suffers from. Interpretation of seeing vitiligo for an unmarried woman: Seeing an unmarried girl spreading vitiligo On her body parts in a dream indicates the good things and good news that she will receive in the coming period and the benefit that she will receive from someone. Whoever sees in a dream the spread of vitiligo on his face and likes its appearance, this indicates that he will earn a lot of money in the near future. In a dream, vitiligo spreads on the face and she does not like its appearance in the dream, as this indicates many problems and worries that she will suffer from. Interpretation of the appearance of vitiligo or leprosy for a married woman: A married woman who sees in a dream the spread of leprosy on her hands, this indicates that she will get a lot of money. As for someone who sees in a dream that leprosy has spread to parts of her body, this indicates many problems, worries, sorrows, and burdens on her. The interpretation of seeing vitiligo on the body varies, and you will see the spread of vitiligo in some parts of the body. This indicates a waste of money and goodness in her life, or a person sees the spread of vitiligo over large parts of the body, which indicates many problems and worries. Who does she see in the dream? The spread of vitiligo in parts of her husband’s body. They did not feel disgusted by this, because this indicates something good. It will happen to them. Whoever sees in a dream the spread of vitiligo on parts of her child, this indicates the recovery of the dreamer. Interpretation of vitiligo or leprosy for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees in a dream that she has contracted vitiligo in parts of her envy, this indicates recovery and kindness that will succeed, and there is another interpretation of her vision. The spread of vitiligo on the body parts of a pregnant woman, as it indicates that God will bless her with a male child. Therefore, we have presented to you the possible interpretations of seeing vitiligo or leprosy in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to interpret it, we receive your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the interpretation as soon as possible.

Whoever sees in a dream the spread of vitiligo on his face and likes its appearance, this indicates that he will earn a lot of money in the near future. In a dream, vitiligo spreads on the face and she does not like its appearance in the dream, as this indicates many problems and worries that she will suffer from. Interpretation of the appearance of vitiligo or leprosy for a married woman: A married woman who sees in a dream the spread of leprosy on her hands, this indicates that she will get a lot of money. As for someone who sees in a dream that leprosy has spread to parts of her body, this indicates many problems, worries, sorrows, and burdens on her. The interpretation of seeing vitiligo on the body varies, and you will see the spread of vitiligo in some parts of the body. This indicates a waste of money and goodness in her life, or a person sees the spread of vitiligo over large parts of the body, which indicates many problems and worries. Who does she see in the dream? The spread of vitiligo in parts of her husband’s body. They did not feel disgusted by this, because this indicates something good. It will happen to them. Whoever sees in a dream the spread of vitiligo on parts of her child, this indicates the recovery of the dreamer. Interpretation of vitiligo or leprosy for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees in a dream that she has contracted vitiligo in parts of her envy, this indicates recovery and kindness that will succeed, and there is another interpretation of her vision. The spread of vitiligo on the body parts of a pregnant woman, as it indicates that God will bless her with a male child. Therefore, we have presented to you the possible interpretations of seeing vitiligo or leprosy in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to interpret it, we receive your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing food in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing food in a dream, via the website roy2a.com. If we dream of eating food, this means a very good life, a good life, happiness and joy, because it indicates the disappearance of worries and sorrows, and spoiled food means worry and sadness. Interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, al-Nabulsi and other interpreters, ancient and modern, so follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing eating food in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing yourself eating delicious food in a dream indicates... Hearing happy news and the abundance of goodness, happiness and stability in the family or marital life. Seeing cold food. It indicates collecting money and obtaining money from a halal source, and if the food is hot, this indicates obtaining money from a prohibited source. Seeing a table full of food indicates hearing good news. Wealth and riches. Seeing food ready and not yet cooked indicates a delay in achieving goals, ambition, comfort, and psychological peace. Seeing some food in a dream indicates a lack of money, financial hardship, and psychological problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing food in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing food in a dream for a single woman? If A girl seeing herself eating food in a dream indicates achieving goals and good luck in studying, working, and obtaining a prominent position. Seeing a girl eating food with appetite in a dream indicates success and success in her life and hearing happy news. What is the interpretation of seeing food in a dream for a married woman? If she sees A married woman in a dream sees a table full of many foods, and it indicates good luck, stability of her married life, and happiness with her husband. Seeing a married woman eating deliciously and the food is delicious indicates prosperity, love, and tenderness with her husband and family. See also: Interpretation of seeing food distributed in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing eating? Food in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating delicious food, it indicates the imminent date of delivery and indicates ease and ease of delivery. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream a table full of food, it indicates an easy birth, good health for the mother and her child, and her happiness with the new baby and good The abundance that you will get. See also: Interpretation of seeing a spoon in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a divorced woman eating food in a dream? If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is eating delicious and delicious food, it indicates achieving what one desires, the prosperity of life, or the seizure of a high position. At work or the stability of his financial life. Seeing food in a divorced dream indicates strong feelings and may indicate her marriage again, and salted food indicates problems and anxiety in her life. What is the interpretation of a dream when I give food to someone I know? Seeing food for a familiar face indicates happiness, stability, and an end. Worry, anxiety, and a comfortable life. Seeing yourself feeding the enemy in a dream indicates survival from dangers and tribulations, overcoming adversity and difficulties, and the abundance of goodness for the pioneer. See also: Interpretation of seeing yourself

title: Interpretation of fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of fire in a dream is one of the dreams that causes tension in the soul, and it should be noted that fire or fire in the dream is the one whose interpretations differed from many scholars, and some of them believe that it is so. Good or symbolizes evil. While the meanings differ depending on the strength and brightness of the fire, its proximity to the dreamer in the dream or its distance, and what about the distance, is it long or short? We also find that those interpretations that we present are nothing but the jurisprudence of scholars in the field of dream interpretations and we do not need to consider that we take this interpretation. Seriously, let us learn about the interpretation of this dream of seeing the respected scholar Ibn Sirin. In this article, here is an encyclopedia. Follow us. Interpretation of fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin. We take you on a journey to learn about the meaning of fire in a dream from the perspective of the world’s dream translator, Ibn Sirin, who based his interpretations on the Qur’an. The generous interpretation of a dream about fire in a dream. Let us learn about the following lines: Ibn Sirin based his interpretation of the dream of fire on the Messenger of what happened to our master Abraham, peace be upon him, when his people threw him into the fire, but God saved him from destruction. Likewise, if someone dreams that his people threw him into the fire, this indicates that there are many enemies. They multiply around him, and despite the evil things they plan for him, by God’s command he will be saved from their plans. While Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees that fire has descended on his house; This indicates the emergence of turmoil. As for seeing the embers of a fire without the fire emerging from them, this symbolizes the spread of disease among people. If the dreamer sees that there is a burning fire to save people and illuminate their path, then this symbolizes the descent of many good things, kindness, and livelihood. It is worth noting that if He sees a fire touching him, this indicates that he will cast the tongues of creation. If the sleeper sees a fire breaking out in a dream, this indicates that this country he is in is the country in which a great war will break out, and if the war does not happen, the people of that country will fall ill. Whoever sees A fire coming out of the middle of his head or hand while he is married, this indicates that he will be blessed with a child who will have many. And whoever sees a fire in front of his house, this symbolizes that he will soon perform the Hajj to the House of God. But if he sees that the fire is burning in the middle of the house, this indicates That he will get married in that house. While Ibn Shirin believes that whoever eats fire, this indicates that he is eating from forbidden money or eating from a bad source and must return to his source of livelihood. Extinguishing a fire in a dream for a single woman. We know the interpretation of extinguishing a fire in a dream, that once a woman sees You feel comfortable, let us follow the interpretation of this dream through the opinions of scholars. The fire in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes the spark of love approaching her, but if she is thrown into the fire, it indicates marriage to the one she loves, and God knows best. You, dear reader, can interpret another dream by entering the dream interpretation application Immediateness. Through this article, we learned about the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream, which the dreamer feels uncomfortable as soon as he sees it, but it can symbolize that everything is as it is.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing embers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing embers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. The dream of embers is one of the true and strange dreams that the dreamer always sees in his public life. There are many indicators and signs that can prove that they are good, some of which are evidence of unexpected things, but seeing charcoal in a dream indicates On money, but it indicates something calculated, and coal also shows something useful and knowledgeable and sought to collect because it shows how easy it is to obtain foodDream of seeing embers Ibn SirinI saw in my dream that coal is evidence of livelihood and profits without context. Frozen hallucinations often indicate in dreams To be patient and endure the difficulties and problems you face. Ibn Sirin, who had dreams in his dreams, said: This is evidence of the existence of problems and the end of disagreement between people. The interpretation of a dream about seeing charcoal in your hand in a dream explains the value and morals of the Prophet. The interpretation of the person who dreams of ashes is evidence of the problems and fears that he experienced. Which sometimes appears to be unfair. The interpretation of seeing embers in the house in a dream is evidence of many blessings and blessings. Light embers and cooking in dreams, which means suffering and discord among people. A dream of seeing embers for a single woman: Seeing a single girl in a dream walking among embers, but she did not Burning to death, indicates that many consequences have been overcome, because it also shows strong will and failure. If she finds herself walking on hot coals and feels pain in her dream, this is a sign of her ability to recover from illness and deal with problems. Seeing coal in a dream for a woman It indicates that the young man is trying to get close to her and there are many challenges in achieving this goal. The interpretation of a dream about eating coal in a dream proves that the girl committed some crimes and faced serious difficulties in dealing with the pressures of life. Explain the dreams of a single woman dreaming of a coal, which indicates that she used her body To spread peace. Dreaming of seeing embers for a married woman. Seeing a married woman walking without ashes in her dreams indicates that she has a strong personality and is able to face the difficulties and problems she faces. Seeing someone walking on an ash tree in a dream at a wedding will save him from some troubles. And the dream of a married woman Who walks in the ashes with her husband in the dream indicates that some accident threatened their marriage, but they quickly got rid of it. The interpretation of a married woman leaving in her dreams for a married woman is evidence of lawful income and living on a large scale. Dreaming of seeing embers for a pregnant woman proves the dream of walking in ashes in A pregnant woman’s dream is about some of the difficulties and complications arising from pregnancy. A pregnant woman seeing coal in her dream is evidence of her patience and stress in life. Explain that seeing burning coal in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of easy childbirth and the health of the fetus. A man’s dream of seeing coals is a vision of a person walking on ashes and not getting burned. In a dream, which indicates his qualities, strength, and status.
